about_the_game:
The Story of a Driver's Journey Home
In the Republic of River, a special law is in place. According to this law, any driver who even slightly hits a person while driving is treated as a criminal on par with a murderer. In other words, violating this law would lead to the driver being condemned as a prisoner.

Our protagonist is a driver heading home, but various obstacles stand in their way. There are unexpected pedestrians, the smart guys, intoxicated cyclists, and even sacred scooters.


Features
In this casual game, players navigate through life, steering clear of obstacles while driving toward the driver's home. It's crucial to stop just before hitting any of them; otherwise, the driver will end up behind bars.

During the journey, the driver might come across valuable items on the road, allowing them to purchase a supercar and a luxurious house. After acquiring the supercar and luxurious house, the driver can continue their journey, heading towards their lavish home.

For a stress-free drive without worrying about hitting anyone, choose the highway with no pedestrians, allowing you to listen to music and relax. If you're seeking excitement and want to break free from the monotony of safe driving, you can engage in a racing game. Only supercars are allowed in this race, and the law doesn't apply on the racing track. Consequently, there is no risk of hitting or killing anyone. Moreover, there are prizes for the winners.


Warning
You might notice some grammatical errors or awkward phrases in this world, but don't worry. It hasn't always been a nation of perfect sanity.

This game may cause people with photosensitive epilepsy to convulse in seizures. Player discretion is advised.

The content of this videogame is purely fictional, is not intended to represent or depict any actual event, person, or entity, and any such similarities are purely coincidental. The makers and publishers of this game do not in any way endorse, condone or encourage engaging in any conduct depicted in this videogame.

All characters in this videogame do not represent any country, race, organization, gender, generation, and so on. Each of them is a unique individual.

name: The Way Home

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad core (Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2450M)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad core (Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2450M)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 555M
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews:
“Thrilling electro music, minimalistic graphic, and essential gameplay. Those are the ingredients of a challenging game that will test your determination and quick reflexes while going back home.”
ThrilledGamers

“操作は簡単だが、突然歩行者や自転車が現れ即座に停止しないと交通事故でゲームオーバー。道路にアイテムが落ちていいる事が有り、それを拾うと車や家をアップグレード可能。シンプルでついついプレイしてしまう。”
Games View-おすすめゲームを日本語で紹介

“NO WAY HOME”
oldboring
short_description: The story of a driver who wants to go home
